The location very close to Hagia Sophia and Topkaki Palace is great. The rooms (we booked a room of the Dominus category, our guests also of the Consul and Imperator category) are modern, spacious, comfortable and very tastefully decorated. The bathroom with jacuzzi is surely a highlight. Most importantly, the management team of the Senatus Hotel is highly professional and helpful. They gave valuable advice on tours, restaurants, a surprise dinner for the birthday of one of our guests and even organised the shipping of our excess luggage by parcel service. We loved it and will definitely choose Senatus Hotel for our next visits in Istanbul!

Reviews.Title: “In the middle of the town...”
Reviews.Author: marcus_janine
Reviews.Content: Istanbul is such a lively city and the Senatus Hotel is a perfect ace to start discovering the East and the West. You are directly located nearby to the sightseeing spots: Hagia Sofia and Sultanahmet. The hotel opened in spring 2010 and the interior is really nice. There was nothing to complain: Especially the stuff was very helpful, e.g. arranged an affordable airport transfer to the hotel or reserved a table in a nearby restaurant and gave us a free room upgrade. Only the breakfast could be a little bit tastier but you don't feel hunger in Istanbul as there are always restaurants around. Try for example the really effort able and tasty DÃ¶ner Kebab at the Bazar or the fresh fish baguettes at the Galata Bridge. Our recommendation: try it out, visit Istanbul and use the Senatus Hotel as your destination.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, strategic location, amazing hotel”
Reviews.Author: FionaCai
Reviews.Content: Just finished my one week vocation in turkey and stayed in hotel for 6 nights. It was great experience there with very convenient location to historical sites, super clean and comfortable room, and romantic atmosphere around the hotel, a lot of good restaurants around. The owner has very good taste at decoration and it is amazing for details. This hotel is very close to four seasons but only about half price of it with awesome quality as well. The staff there are also very friendly and always willing to help. All my other friends love this hotel too and compliment my pick of this hotel! Will come back again and recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Floppylion
Reviews.Content: We spent 6 nights at the Senatus Hotel and enjoyed our stay there. The location is great - walking distance to the wonderful sights of the Old City. The room was small but very clean and well organised and the staff were helpful and friendly. breakfast was fairly standard stuff but with good coffee.

Reviews.Title: “impeccable, state-of-the-art attention to details, best location”
Reviews.Author: Soojin_Yu
Reviews.Content: I just came back from a week-long vacation in Istanbul with my husband, all spent at this fabulous hotel. Senatus is less than a year-old, impeccably clean, ultra-modern, stylish gem in this amazingly ancient and central neighbourhood. Attention to interior design details is amazing: check out the elegant and efficient use of space in each room (curious me got to see three), fancy state-of-the-art bathrooms, the chic elevator buttons, bold and minimalist dinnerware & display at the resto, and the cute little sauna to sooth your body after all that walking. Located in the heart of Sultanahmet, it is within walking distance to the key historical sites, to tramway (Sultanahmet station), countless restaurants, all kinds of shops, and, of course, night life...without being noisy in the rooms! It is also very close to the seaside (not beach) where you can go for a long walk/jog following the ancient walls or just read a book on a bench as the sun sets on the Sea of Marmara. The staff, extremely friendly and informative, know how to make you feel home. They closely advised us on our daily itineraries, catered to all kinds of requests, and, willingly obliging to our manifold questions, shed light into various facets of the contemporary Turkish life. Would definitely recommend and return.

Reviews.Title: “Elegant, Clean and Comfortable in alive but quiet Surrounding”
Reviews.Author: wurzina
Reviews.Content: We Spent our honeymoon in this Elegant and Cozy Hotel. Staff is absolutely friendly and ready to make the best out of everything you will ask. Our Room, Imperator, was incredibly clean, welcoming, comfortable. We tried their restaurant "Palato" at dinner and had a great one. Breakfast served either indoor or outdoor according the Turkish tradition with a bit of intercontinental. Close to the Blue Mosque, Aya Sophia, Grand bazar..it's just a walk from every attraction you will visit. We highly recommend this hotel, everything was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely great boutique hotel, highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: guest1979
Reviews.Content: An absolutely charming boutique hotel, walking distance to Istanbul's main historic attractions and public transportation. The rooms are modern, and very nicely decorated, and the staff extremely helpful with tips on what to see, reservations for restaurants and anything we needed. Although there is room for improving the variety of breakfast, I would highly recommend the hotel for a weekend with your partner or a romantic unforgettable stay in Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “VERY GOOD”
Reviews.Author: aidhck
Reviews.Content: Stayed just two nights and enjoyed the stay.New new hotel. Good sized, quiet double room with LAN & WIFI plus extras like robe and slippers etc. in short "a class act." Dined in the restaurant most pleasant. A.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for price and extremely well situated”
Reviews.Author: bralleng
Reviews.Content: As a female traveling alone and being my first trip to Turkey I was worried about the location of the hotel. I turned to trip advisor for guidance and came across this hotel. It was ranked high across the board plus it claimed a great location, like so many other hotel reviews. This truly was an ideal location tucked behind all the must see sights. It was on a street that was less busy in terms of cars but that also had a nice vibe. The rooms were small but comfortable, clean and modern. The hotel staffers were attentive. Overall felt very safe and well-taken care of would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel, great service, great value”
Reviews.Author: cunard1953
Reviews.Content: The location couldn't have been better, a helpful and attentive staff, modern clean rooms, great bathroom and shower, good breakfast (except the orange juice was Tang). I'd go back again in a heartbeat.

HotelInfo.Name: Senatus Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Akbiyik Caddesi No.40 | Sultanahmet, Istanbul 34122, Turkey
